title: Ginic Tocila
about_history: Grinding wheels have a long history...
about_name_origin: The name 'tocilo' comes from Serbian for 'grind'.
home_intro_text: GINIC Tocila is a recognized name in the field of abrasive products on the European market. While we don’t claim to be the best, few can match us in many of our product categories.
home_why_quality: European quality: wheels manufactured according to ISO and EN standards using top-grade materials.
home_why_price: Competitive prices: European-level quality at affordable prices.
home_why_range: Extensive range: all forms, dimensions and types of bond (V, B, Bf, R).
home_why_delivery: Fast delivery and consistent quality thanks to modern equipment.
home_why_team: Skilled team with international experience guarantees professionalism.
home_conclusion: From a small workshop to a modern factory – GINIC Tocila has become a reliable partner in the abrasive industry.
confirmation_message: Thank you for your message! We will get back to you as soon as possible.
